title: HELP ME PLEASE!
body: I had to delete my League of Legends because of my windows having problems so I had to uninstalling and reinstalling League but it says that "Your older version of League of Legends cannot be removed. Contact your technical support group" everytime I tried to reinstall it. So I went to %appdata% and deleted all files connected to League of Legends and tried to reinstall it again but it kept saying the same thing again. After that I went to control panel and tried to delete League of Legends but it says that my LoL.Na.msi file is missing. Please Riot help I really want to play.

replies.body: There are crucial files missing from your uninstall directory.  We may be able to get this fixed up for you through the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs), which is a multi-faceted tool that can help with a variety of issues.  Go over the guide on running it, and once open select Reinstall -> Clean Uninstall.  This should get you all fixed up, but please let me know if you have any issues.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=lo61urcg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-21T21:53:34.654+0000)

Go over the guide on running it, and once open select Reinstall -> Clean Uninstall.  This should get you all fixed up, but please let me know if you have any issues.
